message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me, and I believe it could be a valuable asset for you as well. Considering its unique features and quality, I would like to offer it to you for $15000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I've done some research, and I'm not sure it's worth the full $15000. Can we meet in the middle at $12500?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your perspective. However, considering the high-quality materials and craftsmanship involved, I am unable to lower the price below $15000. I believe this is a fair price given the value this product offers. Would you be willing to consider this amount?

I understand that the product has high-quality materials and craftsmanship, but I'm still not convinced it's worth the full $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12000 and $15000, so I'll offer $13500. Can we agree on this price?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept an offer closer to my original asking price. Therefore, I propose a final offer of $14500 for the product. This price reflects the exceptional quality and value provided by the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13000, but I'm not comfortable going any higher. Can you meet me at $13000?

Thank you for your understanding, Bob. After reviewing the situation, I am willing to consider a compromise that respects both our positions. I propose a final offer of $13750 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget constraints. I hope this proposal will facilitate our transaction.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to go up to $13000, but I'm not comfortable going any higher. Can you meet me at $13000?
